name: Cube Jumper (BT Games)
description:
You can reach the youtube address of the BT Team by clicking the link in the description.
Enjoy :D

Controls :

A or  Left Arrow Key = Walk Left 

D or Right Arrow Key = Walk Right

Space = Jump

Left Click = Attack
